body_html: @avader906 contributions are welcome in this area. One starting point might be evaluating @abhinavvishnu 's approach for combining TensorFlow and MPI and identifying/removing bottlenecks. BTW, has anyone evaluated CNTK vs TF grpc on those architectures? Resnet CIFAR is implemented under models repo and is well maintained. Resnet training has low bandwidth/compute ratio, and async SGD shouldn't be sensitive to latency, so it would be curious to see if current solution matches CNTK in performance already.
